payload.content: Marina Wyss is a Senior Applied Scientist at Twitch/Amazon, combining roles similar to a Data Scientist and Machine Learning Engineer.

content: Marina Wyss is a Senior Applied Scientist at Twitch/Amazon, combining roles similar to a Data Scientist and Machine Learning Engineer.
